sentence.Network_en: It was even bigger than the igloo of the chief , Klosh - Kwan.
sentence.Network_cn: 它甚至比可络布?克旺酋长的雪屋还要大.

sentence.Network_en: Again there was a great noise at the igloo.
sentence.Network_cn: 雪屋中又是一片极乱的吵杂声.

sentence.Network_en: Setting a fire for cooking will not melt the igloo.
sentence.Network_cn: 在屋内焚木生火煮食,是不会把他们住的冰屋溶掉的.

imagine a research center in the Canadian Arctic . unoccupied in the winter , the center consists of seven laboratory igloos linked by corridors . each corridor connects two igloos .假设在加拿大极圈中有一所冬季不使用的研究中心，该中心的建筑包括七座冰屋，与一些连结用的通道，每条通道只连结两座冰屋。

entry.tran: (伊努伊特人的)拱形圆顶小屋，冰屋
entry.def: Igloos are dome-shaped houses built from blocks of snow by the Inuit people.

means.word_mean: 1. an Eskimo hut; usually built of blocks (of sod or snow) in the shape of a dome
